Text: Why the hell is "The Last Dance" in 128 kbps?!
Because it was a file to download from Within Temptation's site as a reward of buying Special Edition. That's why it's 128 kbps. The rest is a rip from original CD. Sorry :(
Oh well, thanks anyway... hope that we'll get the bonuses in decent quality soon as well. "The Last Dance" is exactly what the rest of the album lacked...

Thanks for the up :)
